d.name: Freze
d.phase: A female Dorogon is looking at you, she is very elegant and seems very refined. It's going to be difficult to approach her as if nothing is going on.

[Charmed, I'm sure, young trainer of domesticable animals.] [Meeting strangers in our beautiful city is becoming rare indeed... Ah, I see you are accompanied by Master Pistachio.] [I am relieved to learn that, otherwise I would have had the frightful task of reporting you to the city guards.]

[Good day, young trainer of domesticable animals.] [Meeting strangers in our beautiful city is becoming rare indeed... Ah, I see you are accompanied by Master Pistachio.] [Enjoy your stay in our magnificent city, and allow yourself to become intoxicated by the purest air that breezes through our streets. I wish you a thoroughly relaxing stay.]
d.a: Thank you kindly, I very much look forward to seeing you again.
Could it be that there is something in particular you'd like?
Can I help you at all?
d.phase: [A gift?] [What a marvellous idea, it seems like forever sice I last received one. If I were to choose such a gift, I'd be delighted with a chocolate cone! However, I only like the finest chocolate and it's only fair to warn you that originality of presentation counts.]
So, you see, there's this Dorogon, but he pays me absolutely no attention whatsoever... I'd love to catch his eye, but I've not the slightest notion how...
These eyes sparkle with the light of a thousand torches at the mere thought of such a delicacy. Whatever you do, don't disappoint her, you could well regret it.

[Thank you kindly my young friend, it's been such a long time since Ive tasted anything like this.] [Living on the surface, you're lucky in that you can make the most of everything mother nature has to offer. I'm sometimes even a little jealous of your freedom.] [By way of a thank you, I've given you a point of wisdom!]
You leave Freze to go about her day, one wrong word could have cost you your life, don't forget that she's a Dorogon...!
You have earned your first point of wisdom! Only four more to go until you can meet the Archdorogon.
d.a: What about wearing a perfume that he likes?
d.phase: Excellent idea, if I mix the fragrances I already have with some water energy, I should be able to concoct a fragrance which should intoxicate any Dorogon!
d.a: I'll go and find some water energy right now!
d.phase: Freze impatiently awaits her water energy. Is it that easy to get her noticed? That's not really your problem.

[I thank you again my young friend. Thanks to you, I should be able to attract his attention without any difficulty whatsoever. Honestly, all he talks about is Caushemesh, but I'm sure I'll be able to change his thinking.] [By way of a thank you, I've given you another point of wisdom!]
d.a: Thanks! (Poor Paum, he's up against it.)
d.phase: You have earned your fourth point of wisdom! Who can help you to acquire the elusive fifth point?

d.name: Freze
d.phase: Greetings, adventurer! How are you? Don't you find that life is sweet on our beautiful island?
